divs: sighting detailsmurrysville: 9:01 pm. just turned off route 22 onto mellon rd., heading south when noticed a couple of random flashing lights near top of hill past ader rd. pulled over on side of road and got out with camcorder. lens was dirty & wouldn't focus. farmer who owns land came out to see if i needed help. he saw my camcorder and asked if i got anything. i replied, not yet, but we've been seeing so many ufos around here, i shoot all objects with the zoom to see what they really are. he started telling me about his dad's saucer sighting in the early 70s and how he knows people who were at kecksburg, etc. he wished me good luck and started walking back to his house. i turned to go back to my car and noticed a large bright yellow-ish orb light over the farm field pretty low above the trees. it dimmed and brightened. i starting shooting. the guy came back up and got to see his first ufo sighting. it hovered, dimmed, then showed back up higher, brighter, double the size, like it was closer, then moved way back, dimming and going out of focus in the cam, over and over... several minutes of this. when i moved across the road to avoid the car's lights whizzing past, i noticed it looked farther back away from me. my daughter and i decided to chase it, like we have in the past. by the time we went around to where it was, it was moving more west towards route 66. we turned around and raced up to top of another hill by farm field with great view on ader road. from there, facing south, i could see it dim and brighten. by the time i shut the car off, got out and started filming, i busted it going from 1 bright ball of light into a "fake plane" ufo that i've seen and filmed before. it had turned around from heading west to going approximately nw. all the while increasing the number of flashing lights and the flash patterns. i could tell in the video that it's similar to ones i filmed on june 16, july 23, & 25 and posted on youtube in hd. the full length of this chase is 2 parts, over 2gig & 16 minutes long and is viewable on my channel: seeingufospa with the others. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=t8jq5rjzrgg why do we see so many ufos? because we look, all the time, all day\night long... and hey, maybe they like us.
